languages.text: Благодаря системам связи повстанцев, захваченным Лорд-капитаном, у е{mf|го|е} верных слуг появился серьезный козырь.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря системам связи повстанцев, захваченным Лордом-капитаном, у е{mf|го|е} верных слуг появился серьезный козырь.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.
languages.original_text: Благодаря системам связи повстанцев, захваченным Лорд-капитаном, у е{mf|го|е} верных слуг появился серьезный козырь.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.
The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.
The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.
The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンが反乱者の通信システムを押収したため、{mf|彼|彼女}に忠誠を誓う部下たちは圧倒的優位に立った。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンが反乱者の通信システムを押収したため、{mf|彼|彼女}に忠誠を誓う部下たちは圧倒的優位に立った。

languages.text: 舰长大人夺取了叛军的通讯系统，这为{mf|他|她}忠诚的仆人们带来了巨大的优势。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人夺取了叛军的通讯系统，这为{mf|他|她}忠诚的仆人们带来了巨大的优势。

languages.text: Los sistemas de comunicación de los rebeldes fueron incautados por {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán}, otorgando así una ventaja considerable a sus leales siervos.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.

traits.locale_text: Los sistemas de comunicación de los rebeldes fueron incautados por {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán}, otorgando así una ventaja considerable a sus leales siervos.

languages.text: Die Übernahme des Kommunikationssystems der Rebellen durch den Lord Captain verschaffte {mf|seinen|ihren} Dienern einen deutlichen Vorteil.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.

traits.locale_text: Die Übernahme des Kommunikationssystems der Rebellen durch den Lord Captain verschaffte {mf|seinen|ihren} Dienern einen deutlichen Vorteil.

languages.text: En s'emparant des systèmes de communication des rebelles, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} offrit à ses fidèles serviteurs un avantage non négligeable.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.

traits.locale_text: En s'emparant des systèmes de communication des rebelles, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} offrit à ses fidèles serviteurs un avantage non négligeable.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın isyancıların telsiz sistemlerini ele geçirmesiyle kendisinin sadık hizmetkârları, önemli bir avantaj elde etti.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's seizure of the rebels' communication systems gave {mf|his|her} loyal servants a significant advantage.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın isyancıların telsiz sistemlerini ele geçirmesiyle kendisinin sadık hizmetkârları, önemli bir avantaj elde etti.
